page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: As in every community, urban or otherwise, there is a mixture of different religions. Here the Church of England is the biggest religion, probably because of the CofE school and the local church building. There are some Roman Catholic families in the area (the nearest Catholic church being about 9 miles away). There are also Methodist families (the nearest Methodist Church about 3 miles away). Some Quaker (Society of Friends) families live in the area (the nearest Quaker meeting being 9 miles away, and another 12 miles). In this community we have no non- Christian religions, such as Muslim or Jewish, as in some other areas. The local CofE church holds one service every Sunday. Each week of the month has a different from - Morning & Evening Prayer and Holy Communion.
